episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' covers a range of quirky and fascinating topics, including the surprising process of tattoo removal, the eccentric dinner parties of the airship inventor Alberto Santos-Dumont, the overwhelming number of scientific studies being published, and the peculiar survival mechanisms of desert tortoises.

facts.fact: When you have a tattoo lasered off, you end up pooing it out.
The man who invented the airship used to hold dinner parties with ten-foot-high chairs so that his guests could experience the joy of flight.
A new scientific study has concluded that there are too many scientific studies.
You should never pick up a desert tortoise; if you do, it can pee itself to death.
